summary: Brynjolf with a slightly modified appearance to make him more attractive.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]Cuter Brynjolf

[size=3][/size][/center][size=2]I don't know about y'all, but for me, Brynjolf's vanilla face didn't match his oh so sexy voice. I mean, he's not bad looking, but he just wasn't cute[i] enough. [/i]So this mod simply tweaks our favorite thief to make him adorably sexy. I got rid of the acne scar complexion, gave him a different scar, made his nose more aesthetically appealing, and slightly tweaked his eye shape. I left him with his vanilla hair style, hair color, and eye color.

This mod should be compatible with any mod that doesn't change Bryn's appearance. I have a crap ton of mods installed and it works fine for me. [/size][b][size=2]This mod [i][u]is[/u] [/i]compatible with Ilhelahve's "Friendly Brynjolf" mod!

[/size][size=4]To Install:
[/size][/b][size=4][size=2]Download and unzip the file to your Skyrim Data folder. Make sure to check that it's enabled before playing.

Special thanks to Just one Neat Cat on tumblr for their tutorial of editing NPCs with the Creation Kit. I am not an experienced modder and the thought of using the CK was very daunting, but their guide really helped. Here's a link: [/size][url=http://oneneatcat.tumblr.com/post/53692040731/how-to-change-an-npcs-face-in-skyrim][size=2]http://oneneatcat.tumblr.com/post/53692040731/how-to-change-an-npcs-face-in-skyrim[/size][/url]

[size=2]These mods aren't required but I do recommend them as they make Skyrim and its inhabitantsÂ a prettier place.
True Vision ENB: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/[/size][/url][size=2]?
Skyrim HD 2K Textures: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/[/size][/url][size=2]?
Enhanced Lights and FX: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/[/size][/url][size=2]?
RealVision ENB: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/[/size][/url][size=2]?
Total Character Makeover: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53716/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53716/[/size][/url][size=2]?[/size][size=3]
[/size]

[/size]
[left][/left][center][/center][/size]
author: MaddieKittie
